author: Claire Wang
title: Korean barbecue spots pivot to become meat markets in Southern California
description: These bbq joints are trying to help while groceries and meat can be hard to find.
content:
Soon after the states shelter-in-place order, a Southern California branch of the Gen Korean BBQ restaurant chain started receiving takeout requests from regular customers who couldnt find any meat or produce at their local grocery stores.
So instead of keep… [+5063 chars]
